vocabulary.definition: able to be understood or comprehended easily
vocabulary.example: The teacher explained the complex concept in a way that was graspable for all the students.

vocabulary.definition: a point of congestion or blockage that slows down progress
vocabulary.example: The lack of funding became a bottleneck for the project, delaying its completion.

vocabulary.definition: equipped with a system of ropes, chains, or other restraints to control movement
vocabulary.example: The puppet was rigged with strings to make it move realistically.

vocabulary.definition: the pervading tone or mood of a place, situation, or creative work
vocabulary.example: The eerie music added to the suspenseful atmosphere of the movie.

vocabulary.definition: to bring back to life or consciousness
vocabulary.example: The new manager's innovative ideas helped revive the company's declining sales.

vocabulary.definition: having or showing a strong desire and determination to succeed
vocabulary.example: She had ambitious plans to start her own business and make a positive impact on society.
